item.title: Instead of banning noobs a better way
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Since this is c+p I guess i’ll post here since it’ll help some servers anyways

Information: Instead of banning noobs, do this to them and they’ll never never come back again lol

Add public boolean bugAbuse = false;

Add that in your commands

[code] if (command.startsWith(“fun”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.bugAbuse = true;
		sM("You have made fun of the other player!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to make fun of..");
            }
        }[/code]

Add in case 9154:

if(bugAbuse){ break; }

Then in boolean process

if(bugAbuse){ plrText = "I AM A NOOB I AM A NOOB I AM A NOOB I AM A NOOB"; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; youdied(); sM("Oh dear you have died!"); pEmote = 2304; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; teleportToX = x; teleportToY = y; }
What this does:
The command turns the other players bugAbuse to on. And in boolean process if bugAbuse is turned on it’ll keep killing the player and he will continue to say ‘i am a noob’ each second. The thing you had to add in case 9154 prevents them from logging out.
No need to ipban them they will never come back

Read full topic
item.source: Instead of banning noobs a better way
